name: Fly With Dumbbells, Decline Bench
how_to_perform:
1. Lie on a decline bench with your shoulders at the edge of the flat surface and your feet secured by footrests.

2. Hold a dumbbell in each hand, resting them directly above your chest with your arms extended fully.

3. Engage your core muscles to maintain stability throughout the exercise.

4. Lower the dumbbells to the sides until they are at ear level or slightly below, keeping your elbows close to your body and maintaining control over the movement.

5. Slowly return to the starting position by lifting the dumbbells back up to the initial position.

6. Keep your movements controlled throughout the exercise, focusing on the contraction in your chest muscles.

7. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.
short_summary: Fly With Dumbbells, Decline Bench is a lower-chest focused exercise using dumbbells performed while lying on a decline bench
